header__description: Content creation is my passion! For many years, programming and design was just a hobby for me. Now I have set the task - to turn a hobby into a favorite profession.
quote: If one does not know to which port one is sailing, no wind is favorable.
about__text_1: I am a web developer, web designer and content creator. I have been studying modern web development and UI/UX design for the last year.
about__text_2: During this time I have created more than <2>20 websites</2> and developed my own unique style, which, I am sure, can be of interest to many people.
about__text_3: Besides the mentioned <2>web technologies</2>, I have development experience using technologies such as Sass, Less and Bootstrap.
about__text_4: I have some experience in backend development, I'm working on it :)
about__text_5: I regularly practice web design using Figma and Photoshop. I am fairly familiar with basic Linux terminal commands. I have real experience in copywriting: written more than 100 articles of which 92 are currently sold, whitout a single return or negative feedback.
about__text_6: I live in Yoshkar-Ola, Russia. I love to cook, travel and play outdor sports. Thank you for your time!
about__socials: My socials networks and messengers are always open. Please feel free to leave your messages.
